about_the_game:
The year is 2092, and humanity is once again experiencing an age of turmoil, as civilizations from Earth to Saturn are gripped by war, unrest, and corruption. Solar Nations 2 is a unique take on the Grand Strategy Genre, as it begins in the near future, between the present day and galaxy-spanning science fiction. Guide the successors of our current age and change the world into something reminiscent of utopian abundance, or dystopian horror!

THE PLANETS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS

The nine planets of Sol are waiting to be conquered.

Each one has borne a new generation of cultures, each ready to prove themselves to the now much larger domain of humanity. Take command of one of these new nations or stick to Old Earth, the choice is yours.

DETAIL WITHOUT TEDIUM

Solar Nations 2 allows great breadth and depth at once. 

In war, you command vast space fleets to conquer the planets, while also intricately customizing each vessel to fit a role of your choosing. 

In peace, you carefully navigate the political intrigues of an interplanetary society, while constructing great projects which will stand as testimonies of your greatness to future generations.

WAR OF THE FUTURE, FOR THE FUTURE

All civilizations of the world are locked in the eternal struggle for dominance over the mind, each has a worldview and a sense of righteousness which makes conflict inevitable, and in the process of evolution, only the fittest survives.

Combine armies, planes, ships, spaceships, and operatives together to build an unstoppable war machine, each having a special part to play in the great game of civilizations. You can subtly undermine your opponents with misdirection and sabotage, or beat them through force of arms, both are valid paths to victory.

UNLIMITED POWER

In Solar Nations 2, you are in control. Everything which happens within your borders is something you preside over - there is no need to rely on randomness or AI help.

DANGERS OF SINGULARITY

The near future is rife with opportunity - and danger. Experience the warnings and exaltations of technology brought to life:

  • The Robotic Revolution

  • Genetic Engineering

  • Colonization of Space

  • Interplanetary Warfare

  • Fusion and Antimatter power

  • Superintelligent AI

  • Terraforming and Climate Change

  • Extraterrestrial Life?

  • Theory of Everything?

  • Faster than Light Travel?

Some question cannot be answered, some can, and some shouldn't.

short_description: In this Grand Strategy game, you take control of the Solar System's Great Powers in 2092 and weather the storm of change as you navigate the uncertain waters of the future. Control the greatest military forces in the world and wage wars on an epic scale: outer space is yours to conquer!
